c1.name: Grand Expectation
c1.effect: Fantastic Voyage's ATK increase no longer has an HP restriction, and gains an additional 20% of Bennett's Base ATK.

c2.name: Impasse Conqueror
c2.effect: When Bennett's HP falls below 70%, his Energy Recharge is increased by 30%.

c3.name: Unstoppable Fervor
c3.effect: Increases the Level of Passion Overload by 3. Maximum upgrade level is 15.

c4.name: Unexpected Odyssey
c4.effect: Using a Normal Attack when executing the second attack of Passion Overload's Charge Level 1 allows an additional attack to be performed. This additional attack does 135% of the second attack's DMG.

c5.name: True Explorer
c5.effect: Increases the Level of Fantastic Voyage by 3. Maximum upgrade level is 15.

c6.name: Fire Ventures with Me
c6.effect: Sword, Claymore, or Polearm-wielding characters inside Fantastic Voyage's radius gain a 15% Pyro DMG Bonus. Normal, Charged, and Plunging Attacks now do Pyro DMG.
